text: He has spent his life best who has enjoyed it most. God will take care that we do not enjoy it any more than is good for us.
author: Samuel Butler

text: I've given it my all. I've done my best. Now, I'm ready with my family to begin the next phase of our lives.
author: Richard M. Daley

text: Man finds it hard to get what he wants, because he does not want the best God finds it hard to give, because He would give the best, and man will not take it.
author: George MacDonald

text: Meditation is all about the pursuit of nothingness. It's like the ultimate rest. It's better than the best sleep you've ever had. It's a quieting of the mind. It sharpens everything, especially your appreciation of your surroundings. It keeps life fresh.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: I don't believe the most successful people are the ones who got the best grades, got into the best schools, or made the most money.
author: Ben Stein
